pr_title: FM2-83 : Create appropriate search functionality for allergy intolerance resource

timeline.message: FM2-83 : Create appropriate search functionality for allergy intolerance resource
FM2-83 : Create appropriate search functionality for allergy intolerance resource

timeline.author: corneliouzbett
corneliouzbett

timeline.message: FM2-90 : Add ability to search patients using address-country

timeline.bodyText: Why do you pass statusParam as TokenOrListParam
timeline.author: corneliouzbett

timeline.bodyText: clinicalStatus should be a TokenOrListParam. The definitions for the values taken by these parameters can be found here. Note that the difference between a TokenParam and a StringParam is that the TokenParam can contain a system value indicating what value-set the value it encodes represents.
timeline.author: ibacher
ibacher

timeline.bodyText: @OptionalParam does not belong here, but only on the ResourceProvider.
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: This seems to be creating a join on the codedAllergen.uuid field, which is not going to work.
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: This seems to be creating a join on the r.reaction.uuid field, which is not going to work.
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: Please add a new line here
timeline.author: ibacher
ibacher
ibacher
